turns.content: Why was the construction worker always worried about his foundation? Because he was afraid it might crack under the pressure!

Oh, I see what you're getting at now! Here's a makeup-themed pun:

"I asked my friend why she always wears such heavy foundation, and she said it's because she wants to have a solid base for the rest of her makeup."
that's not a pun 😅 that's just what foundation does...

You're right, that wasn't a very good pun. Here's a better one:

"Why was the makeup artist's foundation always creased? Because she was using it to smooth wrinkles!"

🤨 there's something there bc of the dramatic irony of using something to remove wrinkles that eventually results in a worse result, but i wouldn't call it a pun.

Maybe try again, but this time makeup in general, it doesn't have to be about foundation

Sure thing! Here's a makeup-themed pun that doesn't specifically reference foundation:

"I told my friend she should use more highlighter to accentuate her features, and she said she already has enough shine going on. But I told her, 'There's no such thing as too much highlight!' "
